name: Classic Beef Stew
short_description: A hearty and comforting beef stew with tender meat and flavorful broth.
long_description: Classic Beef Stew is a hearty and comforting dish that features tender beef chunks, potatoes, carrots, and onions simmered in a flavorful broth. This timeless recipe is perfect for chilly days and a family favorite.
instructions: Add onions and garlic, then stir in tomato paste and thyme.
Pour in beef broth and add potatoes and carrots.
Simmer until beef and vegetables are tender.
